enWisdom: Showing gratitude for blessings is a protection from adversities

Wisdom: شُكْرُ النِّعْمَةِ أَمَانٌ مِنْ تَحْوِيلِهَا وَكَفِيلٌ بِتَأْيِيدِهَا
enWisdom: Gratitude for blessing is a safeguard from its alteration and a guarantee of its sustentation

Wisdom: شُكْرُ النِّعْمَةِ أَمَانٌ مِنْ حُلُولِ النِّقْمَةِ
enWisdom: Gratitude for blessing is a safeguard from the coming of adversity

Wisdom: شُكْرُكَ لِلسَّاخِطِ عَلَيْكَ يُوجِبُ لَكَ مِنْهُ صَلَاحاً وَتَعَطُّفاً
enWisdom: Your gratitude to the one who is angry with you leads to reconciliation and his having a favorable disposition towards you

Wisdom: لِيَكُنِ الشُّكْرُ شَاغِلًا لَكَ عَلَى مُعَافَاتِكَ مِمَّا ابْتُلِيَ بِهِ غَيْرُكَ
enWisdom: Be occupied by gratitude for your good state and [your] safety from that which has afflicted others

Wisdom: مَنْ شَكَرَ مَنْ أَنْعَمَ عَلَيْهِ فَقَدْ كَافَأَهُ
enWisdom: Whoever thanks the one who favours him has indeed recompensed him
Whoever praises Allah, He makes him free from want
One whose gratitude increases, his goodness [and blessing] increases
Blessings are not guarded but by gratitude
